review_data.content: Милый итальянский ресторанчик. Расположен почти в центре города. Персонал работает быстро. Еда вкусная.

review_data.title: Ein kleines Stück Italien mitten in Zürich
review_data.content: Man wird sofort sehr gastfreundlich empfangen und rundum umsorgt. Das ausgezeichnete Essen, sowie das Ambiente und die freundliche Bedienung haben...More

review_data.title: A calm repast on a busy street...
review_data.content: Atop Zurich's "foody street" lies a lovely, professionally staffed restaurant with delicious foods; far and away from the beer halls, McDonalds and panini shops found closer to the "Polybahn" (funicular) at the bottom of the hill. We arrived at Dialog after a long day of...More

review_data.title: Not child friendly
review_data.content: We went recently to this restaurant, 4 adults and 4 small kids. The staff is not child friendly, I would never recommend to go to this place again if you are with kids. We were specially disappointed with one of the waiters, he was very...More

review_data.title: Not bad value in an expensive city.
review_data.content: We had a perfectly decent couple of pizzas here and a good green salad. The service was friendly and the bill when it arrived wasn't alarming. There is plenty of seating within and outside and the location in the old quarter of Zurich is excellent.

review_data.title: I feel like an old friend every time I walk throught the door
review_data.content: Stumbled upon this restaurant for lunch one sunny weekday. I was with my 8 month old son. I was well taken care of and ordered the "menu" of pork tenderloin with mushroom sauce. It was DIVINE and there was tons of food. The lunch menu...More

review_data.title: Very good fresh Italian pasta that didn't cost an arm and a lega
review_data.content: Hard to find somewhere reasonably priced in Zurich but this place was very good quality. Ate there twice over a few days stay as the fresh pasta and the pizza was excellent. Service with a smile and very friendly. Would definetely recommend.

review_data.title: Bonne pizza
review_data.content: Restaurant-pizzeria dans un coin tranquile de la vieille ville. Service aimable et efficace, bonnes pizzas, bonne glaces.

review_data.title: Excellent Italian Pizza with Great Service!!
review_data.content: It was our first evening in Zurich and we stumbled upon Dialog; the pizza and vino were perfect along with the service!

review_data.title: A cosy place for Italian food
review_data.content: Actually I did not plan for any Italian cuisine in Zurich, but as almost every place was full on Friday's evening, I was really lucky to get a table there. Not expecting much, I've chosen pasta alla marinara. It was just perfect, I would say...More

review_data.title: Hey, quelle bonne Pizza!
review_data.content: Accueil très chaleureux dans cette grande tratoria du centre historique de Zürich. Le choix de pizzas est impressionnant, et les...More

review_data.title: Lieblingsrestaurant in Zürich
review_data.content: Eines der besten italienischen Restaurants von Zürich und mein absolutes Lieblingsrestaurant in der Stadt. Sehr freundliche Bedienung und super Preis-Leistungsverhältnis....More

review_data.title: Our second visit to this friendly restaurant with great food
review_data.content: This is now the second time that we have visited this restaurant when staying in Zurich after our annual weeks skiing. Again it didn't dissapoint. The staff are very friendly, and the food is excellent.

review_data.title: Great pizza
review_data.content: I had a truly fantastic pizza in Dialog, one of the best I have had outside of Naples. It's just a pity tha they don't serve Italian beer to match it!
